alert.note: Alert for Pike; Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 10:37PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WALTHALL AND PIKE COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM CST... At 1036 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Jayess to near Salem to near Osyka. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Magnolia, Tylertown, Osyka, Salem, and Mccomb Airport. This includes Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for southern Mississippi.
